Translations.Text: Ziaden human bol communicate GOD except inspiracia za barrier sending posol through He reveals co He wills. He bol the Vela High Wise
Thus my inspirovat ona revelation proclaiming our commandments! Ona nie had idea scripture faith. My robit this beacon guide whomever my zvolit si our servants. Iste ona guide straight chodnicek
Chodnicek GOD do koho belongs everything heavens everything zem. Absolutely all zalezitost controlled GOD
M
A enlightening scripture
My rendered it Arabic Quran ona chapat
It zavarit us do irecity zvladnut honorable full z wisdom
My len ignorovat ona transgressed limits
My sent vela prophet previous generations
Kazdy cas prophet ist them they ridiculed him
Consequently my annihilated ludia je vecer mocny than these! My thus set vzor z previous obec
Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem they say Almighty Omniscient created them
He je Jeden robit zem habitable ona created for ona cesta therein ze ona nasledovat riadne
He je Jeden sends nadol sky zavlazit exact measure revive dead zem therewith! Similarly ona resurrected
He bol Jeden created all laskavy do pairs (muzsky zenska) a He created ona ships zivy inventar ride
mat rad ona zvysok them ona appreciate such zehnat tvoj Lord say Glory bol Jeden subdued this us! My nie controlled them ourselves
My ultimately spatny listok our Lord
They vecer assigned for Him share z Jeho own creation! Iste human bol bol profoundly unappreciative
He zvolit si z Jeho creations dcera Himself chvila zehnat ona syn
When jeden z them dat zvest (z dcera) mat rad they reklamacia the Vela Gracious jeho face darkened misery zlost
They say Co dobry offspring je brought bol dobry pomoc do nie vojnovy
They reklamacia ze angels bol servants the Vela Gracious som zena! they svedok ich creation? Ich reklamovat zapisnica they ziadat
They vecer said the Vela Gracious willed my nie kult them. They nie have zaklad such reklamovat; they len conjecture
My dat them rezervovat si this they upholding it
fact bol lenze they said My zalozit our rodicia beriem certain practices my nasledovat v ich footsteps
Invariably when my sent warner any obec leaders ze obec say My zalozit our rodicia nasledovat certain practices my zotrvat v ich footsteps
